SELECT AID_PACKAGE.PACKAGEID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, 
                                                                    AID_PACKAGE.STATUS, PLEDGE.AMOUNT 
                                                                    FROM AID_PACKAGE INNER JOIN PLEDGE 
                                                                        ON AID_PACKAGE.PACKAGEID = PLEDGE.PACKAGEID 
                                                                    WHERE AID_PACKAGE.STATUS!=

                                                                    AID_PACKAGE.STATUS, PLEDGE.AMOUNT
